name: King Arthur & the Knights of Justice
overview: King Arthur Needs Your Help! The land of ancient England is under siege. King Arthur and his noble Knights of the Round have been imprisoned deep under the distant mountain stronghold of the sorceress Morgana. From within the Cave of Glass, King Arthur is powerless as Morgana's evil Warlords ravage the countryside. Merlin, the great wizard, has reached out into the future to bring you back in time to this land of knights and dragons. Are you willing to face Morgana, retrieve the lost Twelve Keys of Truth, and liberate King Arthur and his men? Merlin and the people of Camelot are depending on you!
